trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Malone
There were no other sightings in Malone on or around September 18th 2011
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
divs: Sighting Detailsone of my sons was leaving for his home and i walked him out after he had driven away i stayed on the front deck for a few minutes and was smoking a cigarette we live in the adirondak mountains by the canadian border were off the grid and have to make our electricity my view of the sky is incredible theres no buildings or lights of anykind were on top of a mountain by ourselves so almost daily were out looking at the skys its beautifull up here so iwas smoking my cigarette looking at the sky its been a bit cooler up here latley so the sky was very crisp and clear tonight and you could see alot of stars well straight out in front of me about 30 degrees up i noticed a star that seem to be flikering imediatly dismissed as plane cause also noticed red in the strobe finished my smoke and stayed out there thinking about hunting season and how i need to cut wood noticed again the strobe and noticed it hadn't really moved which a plane could not do so i started to stare at it and noticed there were more colors there was red green blue yellow and white watched it for about five more minutes it stayed motionless so i went inside and told my other kids to come outside and check this thing out my sons who witnessed it with me are 27 and 23 my sister and brother who also witnessed it are 27 and 18 they all came out and saw the same thing then i thought to get a rifle scope to see it through wow it was much clearer you could see each light seperately the were flashing in a weird pattern some would stay on while others blinked then the others would stay on while the other ones blinked tnen theyd all blink while they blinked you could see it was a large square or triangle shape i thought to try to get somekind of photo but honestly were not rich people and i dont go in much for the technology stuff i tried the camera on my cell phone but we have old crapy prepay type phones and nothing showed up but black sky we do have a cheap older digital cam but the batteries were dead so we continued to stay and watch as it started to jump around a bit it would go left right up down circles spirels we watched it for about an hour then came inside about 45 minutes later my son checked and it was gone we were all left feeling amazed and excited so i figured we'd share it with you thanx
Summary: myself and four other family members saw lights in the sky it was really cool
